lead_paragraph: A leading candidate for next month's Rome mayoral election maintained her opposition to the city's bid for the 2024 Olympics on Monday, although she said she has nothing against the games themselves.

headline.print_headline: Mayor Candidate Opposes Rome 2024 Bid, Not Games Themselves
headline.main: Mayor Candidate Opposes Rome 2024 Bid, Not Games Themselves

snippet: A leading candidate for next month's Rome mayoral election maintained her opposition to the city's bid for the 2024 Olympics on Monday, although she said she has nothing against the games themselves....
